oai_dc:dc.dc:description: According to the colophon, copy completed in the hand of Aḥmad ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-Shāfiʻī al-Qādirī on 23 Muḥarram 1091 AH [February 24, 1680 AD].
Ownership statement by Ṣāliḥ ibn al-Sayyid Ibrāhīm ibn al-Munayyir, Jumādá al-Ukrá 1218 AH [September 1803 AD]. Another ownership statement was deleted.
The book was apparently bound with Muqaddimah fī al-shudūd al-ḥarīr [MS Arab 7019] and Kitāb fī al-taṣawwuf (f. 1r).
MS Arab SM7141. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
